p.a: Public Bid Opening - Expansion Project - April 24, 2020 - 1:30 p.m.

a.title: Go to comments for Public Bid Opening - Expansion Project

span.p: The CASA Charter School Board of Trustees meeting for Monday, April 20, 2020 has been postponed and moved to Wednesday, April 29, 2020 at 6:30 p.m. The meeting will be held virtually via Zoom. Meeting ID: 670 693 0365 / Password: 783050 / Dial by your location +1 646 558 8656 US (New York) / Meeting ID: 670 693 0365 / Password: 783050

a.title: Go to comments for Virtual Board Meeting

span.p: Donate Now! Click here to contribute to CASA's Annual Appeal via mail. Thank you!

div.p: Click here to view 2020-2021 course selection information for current 9th-11th graders.

a.title: Go to comments for Course Selection 2020-2021

div.p: *School CLOSED for the remainder of the year.* Continuity of Education Plan and Fourth Marking Period Memo - Updated April 14, 2020

a.title: Go to comments for 4th Quarter Education Plan & Updates (4.14.2020)

div.p: CASA Charter School has received recognition in the 2020 U.S. News & World Report's Best High School Rankings! Click here for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for U.S. News & World Report

img.alt: Apply NOW for the 20-21 School Year!

a.span: Apply NOW for the 20-21 School Year!

div.p: Now accepting applications for round 2 auditions! Click here for more information!

a.title: Go to comments for Apply NOW for the 20-21 School Year!

img.alt: *NEW* Academic Space for the 20-21 School Year!

a.span: *NEW* Academic Space for the 20-21 School Year!

div.p: CASA will be expanding into a brand new academic wing on the third floor of Strawberry Square. The new space will house all of the academic classrooms, a science lab, and new administrative offices. Click here for the exciting details!

a.title: Go to comments for *NEW* Academic Space for the 20-21 School Year!

div.p: Click here to see information regarding CASA's two Seniors of the Month for March!

a.title: Go to comments for Seniors of the Month

div.p: Click on the link to visit the NEW online CASA Spiritwear Store!

a.title: Go to comments for CASA Spiritwear ON SALE NOW!

div.p: CASA ranks in the top tier of public schools in 2020 rankings.

a.title: Go to comments for Niche.com

div.p: CASA Charter Foundation provides funding and financial support to CASA Charter School. CASA Charter Foundation's Board of Directors works with local communities, foundations, corporations, and individual donors to provide financial resources necessary to achieve CASA's mission.

a.title: Go to comments for CASA Charter School Foundation

div.p: Click here to view the CASA and CRAE Annual Report for 2018.
